text: @SethAbramson It’s not an us or them. It’s not team sports. China lied about the Coronavirus, arrested people trying to warn about it, citizen journalists have disappeared, refused entry to WHO and CDC. Trump also lied, called it a hoax, said it was just a flu etc. They are both to blame.
